name: Joleah Whittle
about: Lead Talent Solutions Consultant at HainesAttract
content:
It's been a true pleasure working alongside Shanthosh over the past 5+ years at HainesAttract. He's a warm, approachable, and kind-hearted team member, always our go-to for any tech-related projects, but also for the more general office tech issues for the office technophobes (me). He's a helper, and a high-achiever, always looking to help others and produce work to the best of his ability.

Over the years, I've worked with Shanthosh on many a project, from building microsites, internal job boards, and applicant tracking systems, plus tailored in-house software. He carefully listens to your needs and makes suggestions and recommendations to suit, he can turn his hand to any challenge, with a keen eye for the little details.

A great friend and colleague to many, I'm very pleased our paths crossed!

name: Raj Khushal
content:
Shanthosh is an unstoppable digital force of nature. Any problem thrown at him, is met with a “no problem” response. His knowledge of all things front and back end development constantly impressed as we tackled technical problems to improve client outcomes. He's built landing pages through to full web platforms and everything in between.

“It's been awesome working with you over many years, saving the day countless times. Go well brother.”

name: Dion Gilchrist
content:
I had the pleasure of managing Shanthosh for five years at HainesAttract, where he consistently impressed with his talent, dedication, and keen eye for design considerations.

Shanthosh's ability to tackle complex challenges, his passion for finding the best solutions, and his enthusiasm for learning new technologies were instrumental in our projects' success. He contributed to a variety of projects, from responsive client websites to complex cloud applications, and was always a well-liked team member.

I highly recommend Shanthosh for any front-end development role; his skills, attention to design, and positive attitude make him a valuable asset to any team.

name: Winter Green
content:
During the weekend of 17-19Feb Shanthosh volunteered to assist our Trust at an ImpactNPO event. I can't speak highly enough about him. The first thing is his joyful work ethics, calm demeanor and willingness to go beyond the task at hand. He also exhibits a great capacity to find solutions to difficult aspects of development.

Shanthosh worked on my ambitious website birthingbetter.org. He fixed many of the UI/UX and SEO issues that was pending for long time. He is good working with others collaborating and actively sharing his ideas. I saw his dedication and passion mentoring the team members. He has great technical skills and knowledge to get the things properly done. Without hesitation I would highly recommend him to handle any type of project and teams.

He has continued to help tidy up some unfinished issues as well. He will always be a valuable asset to any team.

name: Claire Conza
content: Shanthosh led a team of 8 IT professionals at an ImpactNPO event that my organisation Make Give Live was involved in. I was so impressed at his dedication, organisation, skills, experience, and people management skills. He was great problem solving and developing the front end particularly in relation to garment e-commerce functionality and presentation. I would highly recommend him to be a leader in a team. He really went above and beyond and I am very grateful.

name: Manpreet Singh
about: Web Developer at Zoop IT Solutions Limited
content: I had a opportunity to work with Shanthosh and found him very detailed and result oriented. Shanthosh is very innovative and always looking for new solutions and fresh ideas that can advance his knowledge to exceed his client's expectations and goals. We worked together on Zoop's smart tech web application up and running, all done in-house. He helped us to integrate simpro api and design new application. Shanthosh would be an asset to any team. He is highly recommended person. I wish him good luck.

name: Matthew Luxon
content: Shanthosh led a team of IT professionals in designing and building three websites for a charitable foundation I am involved in. Despite a very tight time schedule and a large number of people being involved, Shanthosh stayed calm and focused on what needed to be done at all times. The results are fantastic and have propelled our organisation, and our initiatives, forward light years from where we were. In particular I was impressed with how concerned Shanthosh was that the final result was relevant and able to be used by members of our organisation and I would have no hesitation in recommending him for your project.

name: Shaji Kalidasan
about: Principal Technical Consultant at Sennovate Inc
content: Shanthosh is a great and a good human being and his professional work is of high quality and by itself is a masterpiece. He is my mentor especially for Joomla and PHP related developments. Thank you Shanthosh, where ever you are.

name: Justin Cunningham
about: I help business owners fix their broken marketing
content: Shanthosh is a legend. Design - he can do it. Code -he can do it. Apps -he can find them. Whatever you need Shan can supply. An amazing resource in one man.

name: Grant Shields
content: To anyone looking for a truly dedicated individual with an extremely thorough knowledge of web design and web development then please don't go any further than Shanthosh. His talents in graphic design, web development, web coding and all round online creative ability is amazing. I have only ever met one person that is talented in all facets of web development and in so many different web languages and it is Shanthosh. I would employ Shanthosh again in a heart beat. Highly recommended.

name: Vaclav (Vasek) Fiala
about: Brand Manager at Talus Industries NZ Limited
content: Shanthosh is a very dedicated guy with great knowledge of anything web related. We worked together on getting a new company's website up and running, all done in-house. It was a challenging ASP.Net + SQL server project. He was fully commited to resolving all the inevitable issues along the way. We also worked together on putting together brochures, catalogues and ads. We had lots of fun doing all the product shots as professionally as possible despite limited resources. Shanthosh was always very helpful making any changes and updates in the marketing literature a.s.a.p. He also constantly kept up-to-date with all the technology.

name: Srinivasan Jaganathan
about: Business Analyst at Fonterra Co-Operative Group Ltd
content: Shantosh is extremely multi talented and have in depth knowledge in web development. Very kind, friendly always with a grin and I have enjoyed working with you.

name: Rajesh Kumar Thiyagarajan
about: Senior Infrastructure Specialist at NZ Transport Agency
content: Shanthosh is an excellent and professional Web and Graphic designer. He has an excellent attitude and always thinks out of the box. He is a master in his skill area and knows in-depth knowledge. It was a real pleasure working with him and having him in the team.
